content.title: Type f and press spacebar
content.instructions: Type f and press spacebar. Do this %s times. Target Accuracy 90%%

content.title: Type j and press spacebar
content.instructions: Type j and press spacebar. Do this %s times. Target Accuracy 90%%

title: small letters
instructions: You will be shown some letters. Type as many of them as you can within 1 minute.

title: capital letters
instructions: You will be shown some capital letters. Type as many of them as you can within 1 minute.

title: months - in order
instructions: You will be shown the months of the year in the right order. Type as many of them as you can within 1 minute.

title: months - not in order
instructions: You will be shown the months of the year in random order. Type as many of them as you can within 1 minute.

title: vowels
instructions: You will be shown the vowels as small letters in random order. Type as many of them as you can within 1 minute.

title: planets - in order
instructions: You will be shown the names of planets, in order of how far they are from the Sun. Type as many of them as you can within 1 minute.

title: planets - not in order
instructions: You will be shown the names of planets, in random order. Type as many of them as you can within 1 minute.
